name: Time's A Tickin'
description:
In a world where man and machine have become indistinguishable, 10-2, a cyborg prototype, is destined to stop an evil menace. Armed with nothing but power to control time and his trusty sidearm, “Time Persuader”, he hopes to restore the time fabric from destroying itself.

After waking up with no memory and one command to face the evil menace, 10-2 faces many obstacles to finally confront the menace. Including the fabric of time destroying itself as he progresses to his goal. You could say he has nothing but time, but that would be a lie.
